title: Eva & Nicole
overview: Paris 1972. Eva and Manuel make love in an attic when the French gendarmerie breaks down the door and forcibly takes the girl away to be deported to her country of origin. Marbella 1985. Nicole has married Manuel and has become a powerful woman, owner of the Marbella nightlife and the fashionable nightclub, Nicole's. She has managed to gather the entire jet. Everything points to a perfect night, but the arrival of a stranger surprises everyone: it is Eva.
